idea:
ToolBuy is India's First independent supplier of maintenance, repair and operating supply, offering the widest choice to all industries, professions and trades.

Our Aim is to help & assist small and medium-sized enterprises for their continuously ongoing quest to source high quality tools & brands at best prices.

We travel across India to find unique & premium brands we can bring to you at best prices. We are always looking forward to make special purchases with our supplier/brands and pass the savings to our customers. Because we love a good deal just as much as you do!

Our Aim is to build a powerful brand that industries connect, trust & believe In.
name: TOOLBUY ECOM LLP

idea:
Waveerk is Manufacturer & Exporter of Precision Metal Turned Parts, Plastic Molding Components, Industrial Hardware and other custom made articles.


Our aim is to fulfill the requirement of our valuable patrons by providing them flawless assemblies of “Metal Turned and Plastics Parts”, turned parts are made by using best quality of metals such as Aluminum, Brass, Copper and Ferrous Metals. Our offered ranges are accurate in Dimension, Compact designs, Durable and Resistance against corrosion. We offer these parts in various dimensions and also as per customers' provided specifications.


Waveerk has evolved from a “Small Job Shop” to a “Full Service Manufacturer”, providing industry with high precision machining and assembly. Our achievements depend on our enterprise culture; making profit for Partners and creating high quality international standards products for customers are always our Faith. It is the Faith that urges us to find optimality industrial design, purchase the best materials, adopts TQM system in manufacturing processes and establishes great after-sales services institutions.
name: WAVEERK ENTERPRISES
